name: HomeLight, Inc.
description: Operator of an online real estate marketplace intended to make real estate transactions simple, certain, and satisfying for all. The company's platform delivers outcomes to homebuyers and sellers during every step of the real estate journey such as helping an all-cash offer, unlocking liquidity of their existing home to buy a new one, or creating certainty through a modern closing process, enabling customers to buy or sell their properties.
one_liner: Operator of an online real estate marketplace intended to make real estate transactions simple, certain, and satisfying for all. The company's platform delivers outcomes to homebuyers and sellers during every step of the real estate journey such as helping an all-cash offer, unlocking liquidity of their existing home to buy a new one, or creating certainty through a modern closing process, enabling customers to buy or sell their properties.
